channel.title: CVE Feed for FreeFrom K.K. -- "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FreeFrom K.K. -- "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App for Android

item.title: CVE-2024-36279|2024-06-17T20:09:18.141Z -- freefrom%20k.k. -- %22freefrom%20-%20the%20nostr%20client%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Reliance on obfuscation or encryption of security-relevant inputs without integrity checking issue exists in "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App versions prior to 1.3.5 for Android and iOS. If this vulnerability is exploited, the content of direct messages (DMs) between users may be manipulated by a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-36289|2024-06-17T07:34:25.793Z -- freefrom%20k.k. -- %22freefrom%20-%20the%20nostr%20client%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Reusing a nonce, key pair in encryption issue exists in "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App versions prior to 1.3.5 for Android and iOS. If this vulnerability is exploited, the content of direct messages (DMs) between users may be manipulated by a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-36279|2024-06-17T07:34:09.553Z -- freefrom%20k.k. -- %22freefrom%20-%20the%20nostr%20client%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Reliance on obfuscation or encryption of security-relevant inputs without integrity checking issue exists in "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App versions prior to 1.3.5 for Android and iOS. If this vulnerability is exploited, the content of direct messages (DMs) between users may be manipulated by a man-in-the-middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-36277|2024-06-17T07:33:55.100Z -- freefrom%20k.k. -- %22freefrom%20-%20the%20nostr%20client%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature issue exists in "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App versions prior to 1.3.5 for Android and iOS. The affected app cannot detect event data with invalid signatures.

item.title: CVE-2024-36277|2024-06-17T14:34:10.049Z -- freefrom%20k.k. -- %22freefrom%20-%20the%20nostr%20client%22%20app%20for%20android
item.description: Improper verification of cryptographic signature issue exists in "FreeFrom - the nostr client" App versions prior to 1.3.5 for Android and iOS. The affected app cannot detect event data with invalid signatures.
